meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Karen Lempert Jason Lautenschleger Mary Mansfield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4046.

td.p: Karen Lempert, a librarian from Walpole, Massachusetts
Jason Lautenschleger, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Mary Mansfield, a stay-at-home mom from Odell, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $16,000)

tr.td: BACK TO THE 1960s
(Alex: You're all too young.)
COUNTRY FACTS & FIGURES
OATS
KID STUFF
PARDON MY FRENCH

tr.td: Born in Georgia in 1930, he had a No. 1 hit with the future Georgia state song in 1960

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
